title: Just dont do it.
body:
Don't ap lucian

Don't ad ahri

Dont Ap rengar

Dont ad tf.

Just don't.

People get banned for that.

replies.body: Nobody. Nobody gets banned for that.
If this is a reference to the Singed Support case, then you still do not understand why he actually got banned.

No, they dont get banned for it.

AD TF, AD Ahri are totally fine builds, AP lucian makes no sense.
You are confusing bad players with bad builds. Please dont.

 Also lv24, lol.. Like you know anything about league and what is viable or not, yet.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jRnuOqVN,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-06T22:14:44.614+0000)
>
> No, they dont get banned for it.
> 
> AD TF, AD Ahri are totally fine builds, AP lucian makes no sense.
> You are confusing bad players with bad builds. Please dont.
> 
>  Also lv24, lol.. Like you know anything about league and what is viable or not, yet.

I know a guy who is around Diamond V with AP Lucian.
Players don't get banned for off-meta builds unless its Singed support with smite.

> [{quoted}](name=The Big Piece,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jRnuOqVN,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-02-06T22:37:43.307+0000)
>
> Players don't get banned for off-meta builds unless its Singed support with smite.

you have zero idea of why that singed player was banned do you? i suggest you actually do some amount of research before spewing nonsense

He wasn't banned for playing off-meta, but for basically being uncooperative and forcing other people to positions they weren't comfortable with to accommodate him.

Maybe you should take your own advice.

> [{quoted}](name=Mecha MaIphite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jRnuOqVN,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2017-02-07T00:46:11.083+0000)
>
> He wasn't banned for playing off-meta, but for basically being uncooperative and forcing other people to positions they weren't comfortable with to accommodate him.
> 
> Maybe you should take your own advice.

why should i take my own advice? i wasn't the one who started spewing nonsense in the hopes to get free upvotes by saying something that happened to some douche yet people still think he did nothing wrong whatsoever
Personal interpretations of reality carry no weight in court of lawl. Have a tasty downvote.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jRnuOqVN,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-07T20:40:04.892+0000)
>
> Personal interpretations of reality carry no weight in court of lawl. Have a tasty downvote.

you can downvote me all you want. Doesn't change the fact that he was banned for the right reasons instead of just "he was playing X champion with Y mastery". Your personal interpretation of why he got banned matters a whole lot of nothing to me

You just summed up why i downvoted you. 

I love this community, please never change.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jRnuOqVN,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-07T22:14:33.937+0000)
>
> You just summed up why i downvoted you. 
> 
> I love this community, please never change.

i have no need to change when you are doing the exact same thing as i am. So you can keep talking all you want all it does is makes you an hypocrite. I don't care if you downvote me. I don't care if i say something unpopular. I will voice my opinions and i will call on people's garbage when needed. He got banned for refusing to communicate, for creating a hostile enviorment in every single game he had. He completely ignored when a rioter even told him to stop doing what he was doing due to the environment he was creating. Sorry but he got the rightful ban he deserved if you have an issue with that i could care less. I am not using my "personal interpretations" i read the facts and i am telling you what they are, you have a problem with that? bring it up to Riot and everyone else involved including the dude who got banned
I believe you are flaming the wrong person.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jRnuOqVN,comment-id=000400000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-08T00:03:12.402+0000)
>
> I believe you are flaming the wrong person.

Too bad, because i believe i am flaming the right person. Since you replied to my comment with a condescending message of "personal interpretations and court of law" so don't come here thinking you did nothing wrong

You missed the l, kid.

You seem to have this weird idea that i am defending some guy who got banned. You also seem really salty for no obvious reason.

I guess you "win" whatever epeen competition you are trying so hard to succeed in.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jRnuOqVN,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-08T05:03:18.166+0000)

> 
> You seem to have this weird idea that i am defending some guy who got banned. You also seem really salty for no obvious reason.
> 
> I guess you "win" whatever epeen competition you are trying so hard to succeed in.

and you seem to have this weird idea that you did nothing wrong and be even saltier since i called you out on your BS. Sorry but don't come here replying with terrible comments and saying "take my downvote" and expect me to not say anything
Hillary Clinton.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jRnuOqVN,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-08T20:31:27.138+0000)
>
> Hillary Clinton.

Donald Trump, do i win? what was the point of that comment even?

AP Lucian AKA Black Magic - Don't play it on Rift, if you want to dick around in ascension or poro king with it by all means, but Ive seen people pop off with it

AD Ahri - I kinda understand the logic behind it, but there are worse ideas.  She is an adc without ability damage scaling but a LOT of mobility.

AD TF - Was actually meta for a while in season 5 I think? Back when the jungle was so balls hard that only ranged junglers could handle it with weird aggro management.  Froggen buys {{item:3094}}  on TF, AD TF is fine if you play it right

AP Rengar - yeah it aint great since the rework
Maybe not in ranked, but there's nothing wrong with playing weird shit in normals.
yeah they get banned by anti-fun (insert insulting word) like you
